issue.title: [Rust] Make take kernel not take values of childs when taking a null
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10594](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10594). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, take just takes all values from the childs, irrespectively of whether we took a null or not.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10594?focusedCommentId=17332157) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/129
